title: 'For better, for worse'
brief_description: Taking an average viewer as its hero this cartoon demonstrates satirically how television can be a pleasure and a source of information or, if taken in too large a dose, can mesmerize and engulf the viewer. It contains some inventive gags, lively animation and genial humour.
